definition: the act of coming (or going) out, come out of
details:
noun
- the act of coming (or going) out
= synonyms: egression, emergence
- the becoming visible
= synonyms: emergence, issue
- (astronomy) the reappearance of a celestial body after an eclipse
= synonyms: emersion
verb
- come out of
= synonyms: issue, come out, emerge, come forth, go forth
